articles.content: The British & Irish Lions have confirmed Australias surprise offer to stage this summers series against South Africa is on the table, but the Guardian understands it is likely to be rejected desp… [+2941 chars]

articles.title: West Ham United vs. Liverpool - Football Match Report - January 31, 2021 - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Get a report of the West Ham United vs. Liverpool 2020-21 English Premier League football match.
articles.content:
Mohamed Salah broke his six-game Premier League scoreless streak on Sunday as Liverpool beat West Ham 3-1 at the London Stadium.

articles.author: Andrew McMurtry
articles.title: Controversial Marnus Labuschagne run out sparks Heat explosion to KO Thunder - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The Brisbane Heat have knocked out the Sydney Thunder in a seven-wicket win at Manuka Oval in Canberra, setting up a Challenger match up with the Perth Scorchers despite the luck not going their way throughout the match.
